items.title: F1 1982 mod rFactor
items.author: Luka Karinja & JC Case
items.content:
Based on F1 1982 mod for GP4. 3d work was done mostly in Autodesk 3ds Max. This is a freeware mod.

The F1 and the Formula One Group are under copyright of the FOM and the FIA, the council of administration of the Formula 1 Championship.
The Varjanta Mod Team does not claim any rights to F1 or Formula One Group or the ISI-made rFactor 1 Sim Racing platform.
